introduction.message: Hello! My name is <name>Aleksandr Matyushik</name>, I am an experienced Front-End Developer with over five years of solid experience in software development. Currently, I reside in Minsk, Belarus, and I am seeking new opportunities.

university.name: Belarusian National Technical University
university.degree: Bachelor's degree, Automation and Control of Energy Processes, Relay Protection of Electrical Installations

epam.description:
Worked as a contractor on projects for the companies mentioned below. All details are provided therein.

  • Thomson Reuters
  • Refinitiv
  • LSEG

refinitiv.description:
• Developed mobile and tablet versions of the application, ensuring a seamless and responsive user experience across various devices;
  • Rewrote class components by transitioning to a functional approach with hooks for improved code structure and efficiency;
  • Implemented unit tests (Jest) to provide comprehensive coverage for the project, ensuring robust and reliable code functionality;
  • Implemented the functionality to export grid data to PDF and Excel formats, enhancing the application's versatility and data-sharing capabilities;
  • Implemented lazy loading to enhance performance, optimizing resource loading and improving the overall efficiency of the application;
  • Enhanced the performance of heavily loaded components within the project, leading to noticeable improvements in overall efficiency;
  • Engaged in weekly Scrum calls with the Product Owner, actively discussing potential solutions and future enhancements for the project;
  • Contributed to sprint planning and retrospective sessions, actively participating in daily calls with QA team members;
  • Engaged in configuring the application settings, utilizing tools such as Webpack, Prettier, and ESLint to enhance the development environment and maintain code quality;
  • Mentored a new junior developer on the project, facilitating their adaptation and knowledge enhancement to contribute effectively to the team.

thomson.description:
• Contributed to the development of an application (React) with class-based components, lifecycle methods, and integrated Redux for enhanced state management;
  • Developed a high-performance grid for presenting company data by periods;
  • Developed interactive charts utilizing the Highcharts.js library for dynamic and engaging data visualization;
  • Implemented optimization for requests using IndexedDB, enhancing the efficiency and responsiveness of data retrieval processes;
  • Implemented printing functionality for the application, allowing users to generate hard copies of content seamlessly;
  • Implemented functionality for grid data manipulation, including filtering, grouping, and column-specific search capabilities, enhancing the user experience and data exploration within the application.

bemn.description:
• Setup automatic system for commercial accounting of power consumption
  • Setup remote control of the electrical system.

lseg.description:
Contributed to two projects:

  1. Developed an application using Angular:

    • Managed the migration process from one backend system (REST) to another, transitioning to GraphQL for enhanced functionality and improved data querying capabilities;
    • Developed an audio stream player using Video.js specifically tailored for playing live event streaming;
    • Implemented corrections in the CI/CD configuration;

  2. Worked on app written using React:

    • Developed multiple pages featuring grid structures and data visualization, including charts and a world map for comprehensive data representation;
    • Implemented a World Map component using d3 and topojson, enhancing the application with interactive and visually appealing geographical representation;
    • Implemented interactive charts utilizing the ChartJS library, enhancing the application with dynamic and visually compelling data visualizations;

Participated in the code review process, collaborating with team members to ensure code quality and adherence to best practices;

Engaged in weekly Scrum calls with Product Owners to discuss project updates, priorities, and ensure alignment with stakeholder expectations.

AgileScrum.title: Agile Scrum from Scratch to Scrum Master

NodeJSAuthentication.title: Node.js Authentication APIs with JWT - The Complete Course

ReactNext.title: React + Next.js 13 - From Scratch. TypeScript, Hooks, SSR and Grid

TypeScript.title: TypeScript from Scratch - Complete Course and Design Patterns

NestJS.title: NestJS - From Scratch, Modern Backend with TypeScript and Node JS

RSSchool.title: Certificate of completion Rolling Scopes School

Footer.aboutMeDescription: Hello! My name is Aleksandr Matyushik, I am an experienced Front-End Developer with over five years of solid experience in software development, currently based in Minsk, Belarus. I'm passionate about creating clean, responsive, and user-friendly web applications.
